description: Christina Carter is back for the New Year with another Hogtied REAL TIME shoot. No cuts, no edits, just one long continuous take. No breaks, over an hour of real time intense BDSM action. You see all the tying and untying. You hear everything that goes on between Rigger and model; nothing is left out, you see it as it happened. It takes a special woman to get though one of these high intensity shoots, and Christina Carter is the real deal. I do believe her new favorite words are "Picture time".
title: Christina Carter
